title: Seat Selection Interface (MVP)
description:
Build a visual seat selection interface for a movie theater booking system. Users can view a 60-seat grid (6 rows A-F ├ù 10 columns), see seat availability states (Available/Selected/Occupied), select seats with real-time price calculation (Standard: 50K VND, VIP: 80K VND), and initiate booking. Tech stack: Next.js 14, TypeScript, Zustand, Tailwind CSS.

Key Requirements:
- Display 60 seats in 6├ù10 grid
- Three seat states: Available (gray), Selected (green), Occupied (red)
- Real-time price calculation based on seat type
- Mobile-first responsive design (375px minimum)
- Book Ticket button with enable/disable logic
- Keyboard navigation support
- No backend/authentication (MVP uses mock data)

User Stories:
- P1: View and Select Seats (core selection functionality)
- P2: Understand Seat Availability (visual clarity)

Spec: specs/001-seat-selection/spec.md
Plan: specs/001-seat-selection/plan.md
